verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Go <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> me.
And if you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let them go, <S%H7971><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will smite <S%H5062><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your borders <S%H1366><s%> with frogs: <S%H6854><s%>

And the river <S%H2975><s%> shall bring <S%H8317><s%> forth <S%H8317><s%> frogs <S%H6854><s%> abundantly, <S%H8317><s%> which shall go <S%H5927><s%> up and come <S%H935><s%> into your house, <S%H1004><s%> and into your bedchamber, <S%H2315><s%> <S%H4904><s%> and on your bed, <S%H4296><s%> and into the house <S%H1004><s%> of your servants, <S%H5650><s%> and on your people, <S%H5971><s%> and into your ovens, <S%H8574><s%> and into your kneading troughs: <S%H4863><s%>
And the frogs <S%H6854><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> up both on you, and on your people, <S%H5971><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> your servants. <S%H5650><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Say <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Stretch <S%H5186><s%> forth your hand <S%H3027><s%> with your rod <S%H4294><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the streams, <S%H5104><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the rivers, <S%H2975><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> the ponds, <S%H98><s%> and cause frogs <S%H6854><s%> to come <S%H5927><s%> up on the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and the frogs <S%H6854><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up, and covered <S%H3680><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> with their enchantments, <S%H3909><s%> and brought <S%H5927><s%> up frogs <S%H6854><s%> on the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Entreat <S%H6279><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that he may take <S%H5493><s%> away the frogs <S%H6854><s%> from me, and from my people; <S%H5971><s%> and I will let the people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may do sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> Glory <S%H6286><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> me: when <S%H4970><s%> shall I entreat <S%H6279><s%> for you, and for your servants, <S%H5650><s%> and for your people, <S%H5971><s%> to destroy <S%H3772><s%> the frogs <S%H6854><s%> from you and your houses, <S%H1004><s%> that they may remain <S%H7604><s%> in the river <S%H2975><s%> only? <S%H7535><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> To morrow. <S%H4279><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Be it according to your word: <S%H1697><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that there is none <S%H369><s%> like to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

And the frogs <S%H6854><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from you, and from your houses, <S%H1004><s%> and from your servants, <S%H5650><s%> and from your people; <S%H5971><s%> they shall remain <S%H7604><s%> in the river <S%H2975><s%> only. <S%H7535><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out from Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of the frogs <S%H6854><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had brought <S%H7760><s%> against Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and the frogs <S%H6854><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> out of the houses, <S%H1004><s%> out of the villages, <S%H2691><s%> and out of the fields. <S%H7704><s%>
And they gathered <S%H6651><s%> them together on heaps: <S%H2563><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> stank. <S%H887><s%>

But when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that there was respite, <S%H7309><s%> he hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> and listened <S%H8085><s%> not to them; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said. <S%H1696><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Say <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your rod, <S%H4294><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> that it may become <S%H1961><s%> lice <S%H3654><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And they did <S%H6213><s%> so; <S%H3651><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> with his rod, <S%H4294><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and it became <S%H1961><s%> lice <S%H3654><s%> in man, <S%H120><s%> and in beast; <S%H929><s%> all the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> lice <S%H3654><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so with their enchantments <S%H3909><s%> to bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> lice, <S%H3654><s%> but they could <S%H3201><s%> not: so <S%H3651><s%> there were lice <S%H3654><s%> on man, <S%H120><s%> and on beast. <S%H929><s%>

Then the magicians <S%H2748><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> This <S%H1931><s%> is the finger <S%H676><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%> and Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> and he listened <S%H8085><s%> not to them; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said. <S%H1696><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Rise <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> see, <S%H2009><s%> he comes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to the water; <S%H4325><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> me.

Else, <S%H3588><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you will not let my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies on you, and on your servants, <S%H5650><s%> and on your people, <S%H5971><s%> and into your houses: <S%H1004><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies, and also <S%H1571><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> where on <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> they are.

And I will sever <S%H6395><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> dwell, <S%H5975><s%> that no <S%H1115><s%> swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies shall be there; <S%H8033><s%> to the end <S%H4616><s%> you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And I will put <S%H7760><s%> a division <S%H6304><s%> between <S%H996><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> and your people: <S%H5971><s%> to morrow <S%H4279><s%> shall this <S%H2088><s%> sign <S%H226><s%> be.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so; <S%H3651><s%> and there came <S%H935><s%> a grievous <S%H3515><s%> swarm <S%H6157><s%> of flies into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and into his servants' <S%H5650><s%>houses, <S%H1004><s%> and into all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> was corrupted <S%H7843><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the swarm <S%H6157><s%> of flies.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and for Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Go <S%H3212><s%> you, sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to your God <S%H430><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> It is not meet <S%H3559><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> to do; <S%H6213><s%> for we shall sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the abomination <S%H8441><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God: <S%H430><s%> see, <S%H2005><s%> shall we sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the abomination <S%H8441><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> before their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and will they not stone <S%H5619><s%> us?

We will go <S%H3212><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%>journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> as he shall command <S%H559><s%> us.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I will let you go, <S%H7971><s%> that you may sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> you shall not go <S%H3212><s%> very far <S%H7368><s%> away: entreat <S%H6279><s%> for me.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I go <S%H3318><s%> out from you, and I will entreat <S%H6279><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that the swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies may depart <S%H5493><s%> from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> from his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and from his people, <S%H5971><s%> to morrow: <S%H4279><s%> but let not Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> deal deceitfully <S%H2048><s%> any <S%H3254><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> in not letting the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and entreated <S%H6279><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and he removed <S%H5493><s%> the swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> from his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and from his people; <S%H5971><s%> there remained <S%H7604><s%> not one. <S%H259><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%> at this <S%H2063><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> would he let the people <S%H5971><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>
